The 5 look at each other, trying to find an answer. Finally, Terminion look=
s back to Skulletron, looking shamed.

Terminion: No...

  ----- Original M=
essage -----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunda=
y, August 04, 2002 4:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


     =
   Skulletron:  Don't consider me an enemy so quickly.  I'm just a little m=
oody, ok?

        He pauses for a moment.

        Skulletron:  Can you gu=
ys fly?  I think I know a place where we can settle...

        -------Orig=
inal Message-------

        From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Date: Aug=
ust 04, 2002 04:53:15 PM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Subject=
: Re: Character Debut/Return...

        Terminion is perplexed by Skulletr=
on's words.

        Terminion: It makes me wonder. Why does such a big tal=
ented guy like you have to be our enemy? It doesn't make sense. It would ma=
ke more sense for us to be allies, and to be up against all of the insolent=
 who try to ignore perfectly good characters like ourselves...

          -=
---- Original Message -----
          From: LurkerAbyss
          To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 4:02 AM
         =
 Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                Skulletron:  Yes,=
 I do.

                He spits.

                Skulletron:  Unless you =
think you have a chance of surviving out here.  I know where I'm going.  An=
d I'd hope you know where you are going here, because the desert is seeming=
ly endless, unless you get to be my age...

                -------Original=
 Message-------

                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
             =
   Date: August 04, 2002 04:01:02 AM
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com
                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

              =
  Terminion stops. This time the other 4 stop behind him. Terminion draws a=
 rifle. Monster does so as well. The other 3 draw pistols.

               =
 Terminion: Do you really believe we'd follow you after a comment like that=
?...

                  ----- Original Message -----
                  From=
: LurkerAbyss
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                =
  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:56 AM
                  Subject: Re: Char=
acter Debut/Return...


                        Skulletron stopped angrily,=
 and turned around to face them.

                        Skulletron:  Look=
, if it weren't for this damned organic side of me, I wouldn't have to eat =
you guys to stay in perfect condition, but I do.  So shut up or go to the p=
it!

                        He points his gun at Terminion.

             =
           Skulletron:  I'm having second thoughts on who I will eat first.=


                        He turned around, and continued his long walk...
=

                        -------Original Message-------

                  =
      From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                        Date: August 04,=
 2002 03:23:59 AM
                        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      =
                  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

                 =
       Terminion stopped and the other 4 start pushing him forward.

      =
                  Terminion: Hold the internet connection, here, what's thi=
s about eating people? It sounds kind of like you're crazy.

              =
          Junk Man: There is nothing wrong with being crazy! Don't listen t=
o him, he's so rude.

                        Terminion: I'M rude? You wrec=
ked my ship!

                        Junk Man: Shut up...

               =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: Lu=
rkerAbyss 
                          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          =
                Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:45 AM
                     =
     Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                             =
   Skulletron:  Shut up.  Or else I'll eat you first!

                    =
            Skulletron sneared and kept on walking...

                    =
            -------Original Message-------

                               =
 From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Date: August =
04, 2002 02:57:02 AM
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com
                                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...=


                                Mincer: Will this lead us out of the dese=
rt?...

                                ----- Original Message -----
      =
                          From: LurkerAbyss
                               =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Sent: Sunday, A=
ugust 04, 2002 1:59 AM
                                Subject: Re: Charact=
er Debut/Return...


                                Skulletron glared at T=
erminion sinisterly, and  then looked forward and continued walking...

   =
                             -------Original Message-------

              =
                  From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                            =
    Date: August 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
                                To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Subject: Re: Characte=
r Debut/Return...

                                Terminion stares.

     =
                           Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

       =
                         He looked at the other 4.

                       =
         Monster: Grr.

                                Terminion: Okay. Le=
t's go.

                                They follow Skulletron. Who knows =
why? They just do...

                                ----- Original Messag=
e -----
                                From: LurkerAbyss
                 =
               To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                S=
ent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:32 AM
                                Subjec=
t: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                                Skulletr=
on looked at the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at their fe=
et.

                                Skulletron:  I've seen too much.  You =
follow me.  Or else, I will devour you.  And I'm not kidding.  Don't speak =
until spoken to.  Don't try anything funny, unless you feel like dieing.

 =
                               The Slaughter(organic) half of him hissed, a=
s slime dripped from his mouth  and body.  Skulletron then began walking fo=
rward.  He slipped a gun out from a special compartment, and aimed it at Te=
rminion's head, and then dropped his arm and gun back down to his side, and=
 continued walking...

                                -------Original Mess=
age-------

                                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  =
                              Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
           =
                     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                           =
     Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

                              =
  The Five Felons were just strolling up when this incredible act happened!=


                                Terminion: Hello.

                      =
          He got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need to.

     =
                           Terminion: Hello friend.

                      =
          Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 character limi=
t started, it was tough to survive as a serious character, you just got ign=
ored.

                                Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on.=


                                Danny: No, stupid, what side are WE on?

=
                                Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhea=
d getting decapitated and disemboweled...

                                =
----- Original Message -----
                                From: LurkerAb=
yss
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
            =
                    Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
               =
                 Subject: Character Debut/Return...


                     =
           OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my first character in this "restart".  G=
od, I hate this damn restart.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

           =
                     BIC: 

                                A deserted stre=
tch of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now being replaced by=
 a quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to fall and showered =
the ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky.  As time flew by,=
 the storm raged on, getting more violent each minute.  The sky suddenly bl=
oomed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck the earth below=
.  The wet mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, as a fist plunged=
 up from the ground!  Another streak of lightning met with the fist.  There=
 was an explosion of sparks, and then the ground started to shake vigorousl=
y.  The fist started rising out of the ground, and revealed an arm.  The ar=
m kept rising, and then another fist and arm popped out of the ground.  Soo=
n, a head was revealed.  The figure started forcing its way out of the grou=
nd.  The storm had reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground and rag=
ing on madly.  Within a matter of long, never-ending minutes, the figure st=
ood on two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, so suddenly.  Everything=
 seemed to stop at that moment.  The rain, everything, just disappeared.  T=
he sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm as=
 a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on the land was hideous.  It was a=
lmost two things merged into one.  One half was metallic, almost robotic.  =
The other half, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a hand.......

  =
                              ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...

                                <DIV>OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my=

=
                                <DIV>A deserted stretch of land.  A sk=
y, 
                                once a bright shade of blue, was now be=
ing 
                                replaced by a quick moving area o=
f 
                                darkness.  Soon, rain started to fa=
ll and 
                                showered the ground.  Thunder =
boomed as 
                                lightning pierced the sky. =
 As time flew 
                                by, the storm raged on, gett=
ing more violent 
                                each minute.  The sk=
y suddenly bloomed a 
                                dark purple.  A =
monsterous bolt of 
                                lightning struck the ea=
rth below.  The wet 
                                mud that was once=
 dirt spewed through the air, 
                                as a fist pl=
unged up from the ground!  
                                Another st=
reak of lightning met with the 
                                fist. =
 There was an explosion of sparks, 
                                and the=
n the ground started to shake 
                                vigorously.&=
nbsp; The fist started rising

the ground, and revealed an arm.  
                                The=
 arm kept rising, and then another fist and 
                              =
  arm popped out of the ground.  Soon, a head 
                       =
         was revealed.  The figure started forcing 
                  =
              its way out of the ground.  The storm had 
             =
                   reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground 
      =
                          and raging on madly.  Within a matter of 
  =
                              long, never-ending minutes, the figure stood =
on 
                                two legs now.  The storm stopped j=
ust then, 
                                so suddenly.  Everything se=
emed to stop at 
                                that moment.  The rai=
n, everything, just 
                                disappeared.  The=
 sky was blue, the sun was 
                                beaming, not a =
single cloud up there.  Calm 
                                as a sle=
eping baby.  The figure that stood 
                                on=
 the land was hideous.  It was almost two 
                           =
     things merged into one.  One half was 
                          =
      metallic, almost robotic.  The 
                                =
other half, was slimy, and organic, with a
